content: Former electoral constituency in Singapore **Alexandra Constituency** was a constituency in Singapore. It used to exist from 1968 to 1988 and was merged into [Brickworks Group Representation Constituency](/wiki/Brickworks_Group_Representation_Constituency) (GRC). ## History In 1988, the constituency was merged into [Brickworks GRC](/wiki/Brickworks_Group_Representation_Constituency) following the establishment of [Group representation constituency](/wiki/Group_representation_constituency) (GRC) and [Single Member Constituency](/wiki/Single_Member_Constituency) (SMC). ## Member of Parliament **Year** **Member****Party****Formation**(/wiki/1968_Singaporean_general_election)[Wong Lin Ken](/wiki/Wong_Lin_Ken)[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)(/wiki/1972_Singaporean_general_election)(/wiki/1976_Singaporean_general_election)[Tan Soo Khoon](/wiki/Tan_Soo_Khoon)(/wiki/1980_Singaporean_general_election)(/wiki/1984_Singaporean_general_election)**Constituency abolished (1988)** ## Electoral results Note: The [Elections Department](/wiki/Elections_Department_Singapore) does not include rejected votes when calculating the vote shares of candidates. Hence, all candidates' vote shares will total to 100% at any given election (may not appear so in multi-way contests due to rounding). ### Elections in the 1960s [General Election 1968](/wiki/1968_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****[Wong Lin Ken](/wiki/Wong_Lin_Ken)*****Unopposed***[Registered electors](/wiki/Voter_registration)13,317[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party) **win** (new seat) ### Elections in the 1970s [General Election 1972](/wiki/1972_Singaporean_general_election) PartyCandidateVotes%±%**[PAP](/wiki/People%27s_Action_Party)****[Wong Lin Ken](/wiki/Wong_Lin_Ken)** **17,965** **77.52** **N/A** [WP](/wiki/Workers%27_Party_of_Singapore)Wong Kui Yu3,78216.32N/A[UNF](/wiki/United_National_Front_(Singapore))S.
